Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the existence of a "Lingayat Catholic Church" by presenting an image and text suggesting its establishment in Bangalore, Karnataka.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or supporting information to validate the existence of a "Lingayat Catholic Church" in Bangalore.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image and text shared on social media accurately represent a real church, without verifying the authenticity or source of the information.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is actually of a church called "OUR LADY OF DOLOURS CHURCH" in Dahanu, Maharashtra, and not a "Lingayat Catholic Church" in Bangalore.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim presents an alternative explanation for the image, stating that it was photoshopped and circulated as disinformation related to the Lingayat issue.
